column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I like the original location better for some reason. The food was good but was missing something je ne se quois
column2: I would come back to this location because it is somewhat closer to me. This place is not your typical japanese ramen joint
column3: its a fusion place so don't expect naruto and other stuff you see in japanese ramen. Â Overall i LIKE IT
column4: but I prefer Tiger Den if it was a showdown of japanese fusion ramen.
